articles.title: World Cup: France secure place in final with 2-0 win over Morocco
articles.description: France have teed up a blockbuster FIFA World Cup final with Argentina after wasting no time in scoring in the semifinal to set up an end to Morocco’s fairytale.
articles.content:
France have teed up a blockbuster FIFA World Cup final with Argentina after ending Morocco’s fairytale with a 2-0 win in the semi final.
